channel.title: Writeups & Reports on
channel.description: Recent content in Writeups & Reports on

item.title: Tryhackme: Cicada 3301 Vol. 1
item.description: A basic steganography and cryptography challenge room based on the Cicada 3301 challenges

item.title: Hack The Box: Alienphish
item.description: This CTF was part of the event hosted at ctf.hackthebox.eu “Cyberapocalypse”. Mission: Find a payload and a flag inside “Alien Weaknesses.pptx”,

item.title: Tryhackme writeup: Brainpan
item.description: Brainpan is part of the “Offensive Pentesting Path” in TryHackMe, and it is a straight-forward buffer overflow activity with further extra steps to achieve full privilege escalation.

item.title: Tryhackme writeup: Retro
item.description: Boot to root: Retro wordpress theme & exploitation of CVE-2019-1388

item.title: Tryhackme writeup: Attacking ICS #1
item.description: This room covers an introduction to ICS / SCADA controls, and some manipulation that can be done remotely. Starting with a virtuaplant appliance, and using python scripts to send information via Modbus TCP to retrieve register states.
